articles.content:

articles.title: Georgia school shooter was physically harassed by bullies, called ‘gay,’ his dad said: ‘He’s going through a lot’
articles.description: Colt Gray, 14, opened fire at Apalachee High School, killing two students and two teachers.
articles.content: Alleged Georgia school shooter Colt Gray was physically harassed by bullies and frequently called “gay,” his father told authorities in a phone call last year. Gray, 14, opened fire at Apalachee High School in Winder on Wednesday morning, September 4... [1944 chars]

Ashley Tisdale is now a two-time mom!
The “High School Musical” star gave birth to her and husband Christopher French’s second baby on Friday.

articles.title: Tragedy Hits Nicole Kidman’s Family Hours Before Venice Award Win
articles.description: Nicole Kidman left the Venice Film Festival hours before winning the prestigious Best Actress award after discovering that her beloved mother had passed away in Australia.
articles.content:
Nicole Kidman revealed that her beloved mother, Janelle Kidman, has died just hours before she was awarded the Best Actress award at the Venice Film Festival on Saturday.
Kidman, 57, said in a statement that she had to leave the film festival to be w... [1982 chars]

articles.title: Google continues Play Points promo with Playground game
articles.description: Google Play has been heavily promoting its Play Points loyalty program, with the latest example being at Zedd In The Park.
articles.content:

Zedd In The Park is a musical festival happening in Los Angeles this weekend, with... [1306 chars]

articles.title: Ravens' Ronnie Stanley irked by multiple penalties against him
articles.description: Ravens left tackle Ronnie Stanley was flagged three times for illegal formation against the Chiefs and said he felt like the referees were "trying to make an example" of him given the rule's point of emphasis this season.
articles.content:
Open Extended Reactions
KANSAS CITY, Mo. -- Baltimore Ravens left tackle Ronnie Stanley felt he was being singled out by officials during Thursday night's 27-20 loss to the Kansas City Chiefs.
Stanley was flagged three times for illegal formation. He... [1733 chars]

articles.title: How ‘Moana 2’ charted a course back to the big screen
articles.description: Decision to make sequel a movie prime example of Disney’s new course
articles.content:
Decision to make sequel a movie prime example of Disney’s new course
When you look at some of the numbers, it’s hard to believe “Moana 2” was ever going to be anything but a movie.

articles.description: Steve Jobs is supposedly the ultimate example of an entrepreneur remaining in "founder mode"
articles.content:

Yet another new buzzword has hit the world of startups, dividing the already fractious Silicon Valley community over the best way to manage a growing company.

articles.title: China’s New York spy is a wake-up call
articles.description: China's espionage and influence campaigns against the United States deserve far greater scrutiny. The Chinese agent in Kathy Hochul's office is one example.
articles.content:
A former deputy chief of staff to Gov. Kathy Hochul (D-NY) has been charged for acting as an unregistered agent for China.
Linda Sun and her husband are accused by the Justice Department of promoting the Chinese Communist Party’s agenda on key concer... [5537 chars]

articles.title: Doing lunges while brushing your teeth, and other ways to stack healthy habits
articles.description: Care to do lunges while you brush your teeth? Fitness experts say that's an example of habit stacking, a concept that can lead to better fitness.
articles.content:
As simple as it sounds, Lindsay Kee’s revamped exercise routine began with standing up to take the dog out.
She decided to do a few standing stretches before leaving, and did some squats or jumping jacks when she got back home. Over time she added to... [2918 chars]
